title: Flamesplitter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a target. If they're **doused**, undouse them and select two other targets to douse instead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If all other Underworld players are dead, you will become the Apocalypse.
- Roleblock and redirect immune.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Let everyone **burn**. Kill all who oppose the Underworld sect.

desc:
Post 2392
*A victorious fire, seen through parted flames!*
